sequence:
Superstar of the Blue Seas

<size=45>Chapter 5 - The Mythical Seal</size>

scripts.say: Although there were a few incidents along the way, Saratoga's charity concert concluded without a hitch.
Hehehe~ Who's the cutest little seal? That's right, you are~
The "Mythical Seal" – which in reality was just a regular seal – rubbed its nose against Saratoga's leg.
You see, you can't just protect cuties like this for a day and call it done. It's something you do every day and work hard at it!
Had I known that, I could've offered to help sooner...

options.content: Offer to help protect the seas

scripts.say: Thanks a ton, Commander! I was going to ask you anyway after the concert, but things just kind of went the way they did~
Sara, everything's ready in just a bit.
Should be. Why don't you come too, Commander?
Huh? There's more stuff going on after the concert?
It's a bit late, but today is actually when both the Sakura Empire and Dragon Empery celebrate the Night of Sevens.
Yat Sen has made mouth-watering food for the occasion, so be sure to stop by.
I'm hungry...
There'll be a fireworks display too, nya~ I designed them specifically so they won't cause distress to the marine life in the tanks, nya~
Hey... anyone else feel like we're forgetting something?
Hmm, what could that be...?
The name for the little seal, I believe!
Oh, right! We can't let this cutie go nameless!
Commander, do you have any good suggestions?
It was decided that the name of the seal – the star of Saratoga's concert and beloved treasure of the sea – would be...
Sara... Seal... I've got it! "Sally"! Let's go with that!
Okay... Commander, I'm counting on you to help me – and cute little Sally here...
... protect these beautiful blue seas and all the adorable marine life it hosts! Everybody's support matters♪
